sentences.en: A brandy and port is the very thing for a hangover.
sentences.cn: 掺红葡萄酒的白兰地治宿醉最有效.

sentences.en: As a hangover from rationing, they mixed butter and margarine.
sentences.cn: 作为食品配给制的一种遗留影响，他们总把黄油和人造黄油混在一起吃。

sentences.en: He appeared at breakfast bleary-eyed and with a hangover.
sentences.cn: 他吃早餐时两眼迷糊，宿醉未醒。

sentences.en: He had a hangover, so he ordered a sandwich to settle his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他有一点儿宿醉, 所以点了三明治让胃舒服一点.

sentences.en: He had a terrible hangover after the New Year's Eve party.
sentences.cn: 在除夕夜的宴会后,他宿醉,十分难受.

sentences.en: He's still sleeping off yesterday's hangover.
sentences.cn: 他还在睡觉消除昨天的宿醉呢.

sentences.en: I had a terrible hangover the next day.
sentences.cn: 第二天我的宿醉反应很厉害。

sentences.en: I have a hangover ( this morning ).
sentences.cn: 我 ( 今天早上 ) 宿醉还没醒.

sentences.en: Oh, my god! Do not make me run with this hangover.
sentences.cn: 天啊! 不要在我宿醉后还要叫我跑步.

sentences.en: She woke up with a terrible hangover.
sentences.cn: 她醒来时宿醉反应很厉害。

sentences.en: Some overseas markets are experiencing a hangover after last year's excesses.
sentences.cn: 一些海外市场去年透支了涨幅,目前正在经历回调.

sentences.en: There is a hangover from that.
sentences.cn: 从这里产生了一种后遗症.

sentences.en: This is a hangover from Joe's furry ancestors.
sentences.cn: 这是从乔的有毛的的祖先那里遗留下来的.

sentences.en: Truth: Too much alcohol in any form a hangover.
sentences.cn: 真理: 不管什么形式的酒,只要酒精过量就会让你宿醉.

sentences.en: Yeah . We drank like a fish. I had a hangover this morning.
sentences.cn: 小金:对啊,我们灌了一堆酒. 我今早还宿醉了.

trans.tran_cn: 宿醉（酒后醒来的头痛和不舒服），遗留的感觉（或风俗、习惯等），<医>后遗症，残余物
trans.tran_en: a pain in your head and a feeling of sickness that you get the day after you have drunk too much alcohol
